item.title: AA/UA 點數促銷
item.description: AA 賣點數囉，最划算的買法是 76000+ 27500 = $1905.7 USD，含稅算下去是2078.63 USD。 Miles purchased Bonus miles + Discount 1,000 - 15,000 0 + 15% Off 16,000 - 30,000 5,000 + 15% Off 31,000 - 45,000 10,000 + 15% Off 46,000 - 60,000 15,000 + 15% Off 61,000 - 75,000 20,000 + 15% Off 76,000 - 100,000 27,500 + 15% Off 2,078.63 USD 成本買到 103,500 AA miles 約是 2 CPM(Cents Per Mile) 同時 UA也在賣點數，不過UA貶值得很快啊。
